paragraph.paragraph:
The EiffelCOM library includes the following clusters:
A
../reference/Constants/index.xml Constants
cluster provides standard COM constants and enumerations.
A
01_interfaces.xml Interfaces
cluster includes wrappers for standard interfaces that the EiffelCOM wizard does not generate and deferred classes:
../reference/Interfaces/ecom_interface_chart.xml ECOM_INTERFACE ,
../reference/Interfaces/ecom_queriable_chart.xml ECOM_QUERIABLE , and
../reference/Interfaces/ecom_stub_chart.xml ECOM_STUB .
A
02_structures.xml Structures
cluster includes wrappers for COM structures and additional data structures.
A
../reference/Support/index.xml Support
cluster provides access to helper classes.
See Also
/technologies/com/index.xml The Component Object Model
../../../tools/wizards/com/index.xml EiffelCOM wizard
